text: Basawan Singh Indoor Stadium is a public indoor stadium.Information & Public Relation Department, Govt. of Bihar inviting quotation of planning and development department for Basawan Singh Indoor Stadium This stadium is also known as Swatantrata Senani Basawan Singh Indoor Stadium. ==Location== This stadium is located at Yadav Chowk, Cinema Road, Hajipur. ==References== Category:Hajipur Category:Vaishali district Category:Sports venues in Bihar Category:Indoor arenas in India
title: Basawan Singh Indoor Stadium
